name: Snakey Free
description:
The snake game to occupy every spare minute of your time. Get ready to play probably the most entertaining snake game to date.

The concept behind the game has very much stayed like the all time classic but with many cool things.

* This snake is not restricted to 4 directions, no way!
* Enjoy a full 360 degree snake, with perfect control and smoothness.
* Use your snakey tongue to eat fruit to make your snake longer.
* As your snake gets bigger your snake will also change appearance.
* Avoid bombs on the way.
* Simply move your snake by tapping either side of your device. No need for buttons, so you can really enjoy game much much more.
* Cute animated graphics.
* Many different backdrop scenes which get randomly selected for you.
* Game gets harder as you progress through the levels.

Never has Snake games been so much fun, cute and addictive.

The demo is limited to snake size and therefore you cannot get high scores.

Share your score and progress with your friends in the 'Online Scoreboards'.

Snakey is waiting for you, so grab this game and show the rest just how to get really really long.
